View on GitHub

Arcus Background Jobs

Background job development in Azure with a breeze

Installation

The Arcus BackgroundJobs can be installed via NuGet:

PM > Install-Package Arcus.BackgroundJobs.CloudEvents

For more granular packages we recommend reading the documentation.

Features

  • General
    • Securely Receive CloudEvents
  • Security
    • Automatically invalidate cached secrets from Azure Key Vault
